meanings.meaning: ask sb for food, money, etc.

examples: He had to beg food from passers-by.

meanings.meaning: ask for sth with great emotion

examples: In the end they almost begged him to take the job.
We humbly beg Your Majesty to show mercy.
Don't leave me, he begged her silently.
We went to him to beg for forgiveness.
(formal) Do not do that, I beg of you.
